revision.text:
This is the default [[sound sequence]] for closing a normal door without a particular texture in ''[[Strife]]''. It is redirected from [[DoorSmallMetal]]. It is also used for opening [[animated door]]s with the DORCRG01 texture.
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :DoorCloseSmallMetal play doors/small_metal_close nostopcutoff end [[Category:Sound sequences]]
